Posts.EditableText: Zombies attack! It's my first completed game from quest that I've made with quest. (aside from a few test 'house' games). As the title suggests, its a horror. It has combat, situations of chance and puzzles involved. I'm not sure how they're stack up against other puzzle games, but its my first and I wanted it done. In many scenario's you're faced with a situation that is influenced on you're health. Eg. picking a lock requires concentration, and the lower your health the lower you're chances of success. I've implemented this chance of success situation influenced by health in environmental obstacles and combat. Hopefully I've included enough help in the guide so you won't get stuck. The hint system means that if you ever get stuck you can use progressively helpful hints. hint, hint 2, then hint 3. Hint 3 is really the walkthrough for that situation, hint 2 is a decent guidline and hint is pointing you in the right direction. It has 47 rooms and 223 objects, so if anyone plays it can you give adivce and criticism is welcome
Posts.HTML:
Zombies attack!

It's my first completed game from quest that I've made with quest. (aside from a few test 'house' games). As the title suggests, its a horror. It has combat, situations of chance and puzzles involved. I'm not sure how they're stack up against other puzzle games, but its my first and I wanted it done. In many scenario's you're faced with a situation that is influenced on you're health. Eg. picking a lock requires concentration, and the lower your health the lower you're chances of success. I've implemented this chance of success situation influenced by health in environmental obstacles and combat.

Hopefully I've included enough help in the guide so you won't get stuck. The hint system means that if you ever get stuck you can use progressively helpful hints. hint, hint 2, then hint 3. Hint 3 is really the walkthrough for that situation, hint 2 is a decent guidline and hint is pointing you in the right direction. It has 47 rooms and 223 objects, so if anyone plays it can you give adivce and criticism is welcome
